thread.section_title: The London NYC - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: My Favorite Midtown Hotel
thread.title_full: My Favorite Midtown Hotel - Review of The London NYC, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah D
title: My Favorite Midtown Hotel
text:
I absolutely love staying at The London! I don't care for being in the middle of Times Square, and this location is just far enough north to make it a great- and quiet location. The all-suites rooms are one of the main reasons staying here is so lovely- New York hotel rooms are typically very small, so it is nice to stretch out a bit.
The rooms are beautiful- the beds are comfortable and the rooms are very quiet by NYC standards. My only complaint is the lack of in-room coffee. I expect hotels of this caliber to have a single-serve brewer or at least complimentary coffee in a main area.
This hotel is perfect for anyone needing a central location! I enjoyed waking up, grabbing coffee and strolling through Central Park. I also love how close it is to the Columbus Circle Whole Foods- so nice to grab healthy lunch/dinner items.
The location, space, staff and attention to detail make this hotel one of my top NYC recommendations!
Room Tip: Rooms on the north side above the 11th floor have a small Central Park view! See more room tips
